document.heading: Special Event Waste Diversion Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-134, the “Special Event Waste Diversion Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-344. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 6, 2014, and June 3, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 18, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-357 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-134 became effective on Aug. 8, 2014.
